data.description:
DETERMINING AVAILABLE WELLSPRINGS

During each scene, your surroundings grant you two different wellsprings. (See @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.JHjzGHXO9qm8HVW9]{Invoker Rules})
When you perform an invocation, choose one option you have access to, then apply its effects to one creature you can see.

basic.name: Aero Blast
basic.description: You deal @DMG[20 air] damage to the target.

advanced.name: Aero Hex
advanced.description:
Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal bolt and fire damage.

@EFFECT[]

superior2.name: Twister
superior2.description: The target suffers @DMG[10 air] and also suffers @EFFECT[dazed].

basic.name: Geo Blast
basic.description: You deal @DMG[20 earth] damage to the target.

advanced.name: Geo Hex
advanced.description:
Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal air and ice damage.

@EFFECT[]

superior2.name: Quicksand
superior2.description: The target suffers @DMG[10 earth] and also suffers @EFFECT[slow].

basic.name: Pyro Blast
basic.description: You deal @DMG[20 fire] damage to the target.

advanced.name: Pyro Hex
advanced.description:
Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal earth and ice damage.

@EFFECT[]

superior1.name: Burst
superior1.description: The target suffers @DMG[10 fire] and also suffers @EFFECT[shaken].

superior2.name: Smoke
superior2.description: The target loses @LOSS[20 mp] and also suffers @EFFECT[weak].

basic.name: Electro Blast
basic.description: You deal @DMG[20 bolt] damage to the target.

advanced.name: Electro Hex
advanced.description:
Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal earth and fire damage.

@EFFECT[]

superior1.name: Static
superior1.description: The target suffers @DMG[10 bolt] and also suffers @EFFECT[slow].

superior2.name: Thunder
superior2.description: The target loses @LOSS[20 mp] and also suffers @EFFECT[dazed].

basic.name: Hydro Blast
basic.description: You deal @DMG[20 ice] damage to the target.

advanced.name: Hydro Hex
advanced.description:
Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal air and bolt damage.

@EFFECT[]

superior1.name: Chill
superior1.description: The target loses @LOSS[20 mp] and also suffers @EFFECT[shaken].

superior2.name: Frostbite
superior2.description: The target suffers @DMG[10 ice] and also suffers @EFFECT[weak].
